on.from sentence: As shown in Table 4, the final results on the movie review dataset are consistent with the development results, where S-LSTM outperforms BiLSTM significantly, with a faster speed.

16 datatsets of Liu et al. (2017).best results: S-LSTM gives the best results on 12

among.from sentence: As shown in Table 5, among the 16 datasets of Liu et al. (2017), S-LSTM gives the best results on 12, compared with BiLSTM and 2 layered BiLSTM models. The average accuracy of S-LSTM is 85.6%, significantly higher compared with 84.9% by 2-layer stacked BiLSTM.

WSJ dataset.better results: S-LSTM gives significantly better results compared with BiLSTM
WSJ dataset.from sentence: As can be seen in Table 6, S-LSTM gives significantly better results compared with BiLSTM on the WSJ dataset.

CoNLL test set.from sentence: For NER (Table 7), S-LSTM gives an F1-score of 91.57% on the CoNLL test set, which is significantly better compared with BiLSTMs.
